body_html:
It's hard for us to help you if you don't include more example code.

From your previous title,

RuntimeError: Assertion `cur_target >= 0 && cur_target < n_classes' failed

I'm guessing this is the error you ran into. I don't think this is a bug: this error occurs when you're using CrossEntropyLoss or NLLLoss and your target value is not in the range [0, n_classes). Please check your the output value of your target.

body:
It's hard for us to help you if you don't include more example code.

From your previous title,
> RuntimeError: Assertion `cur_target >= 0 && cur_target < n_classes' failed

I'm guessing this is the error you ran into. I don't think this is a bug: this error occurs when you're using CrossEntropyLoss or NLLLoss and your `target` value is not in the range `[0, n_classes)`. Please check your the output value of your `target`.
